readable.title: 700884207_d3ec546494
readable.content: A baby is dressed up in pink gear and staring while an adult holds her steady . A small baby wearing sunglasses sits on an adult 's lap . A woman holds a fat baby with sunglasses and a denim hat . A woman is holding onto a baby wearing who is wearing sunglasses . The baby in a blue jean hat and sunglasses looks at the camera while being held .
